newsitem.title: CANADA: Moore Corp to acquire Argentine print firm.
newsitem.headline: Moore Corp to acquire Argentine print firm.

text.p: Moore Corp Ltd said on Tuesday that it has reached an agreement to acquire most of the existing businesses of Rotativos Venus S.A., a print management company in Argentina.

"Moore has been interested in Argentina for some time and we are pleased to have reached an agreement with Rotativos Venus, a company with outstanding reputation in the marketplace," Wayne Adams, president of Moore's Latin American operations, said in a statement. Moore said Isaac Zaharya, Rotativos' primary shareholder, has accepted the position of managing director of Moore Argentina SA.
"As a shareholder in the new company, (Zaharya) will be instrumental in establishing Moore's presence in Argentina and expanding the scope of our business activities in the country," Moore said.

During the next two years, Rotativos' product and services will be expanded to include Moore's business communications services such as outsourcing and statement printing, electronic forms, digital printing and labels.
